attributes.review: I am so sorry to anyone who comes across this app. There is a big Cheeto man making weird faces on every screen🤢 not only is this app uninformative, but it’s simply repulsive!! Please remove this from the App Store as soon as possible... I don’t want anyone else going ✨blind✨🌝
attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP

attributes.review: This app is 🚮 it’s the worse like I can’t even explain it 😔 like worse than my mental health 🚑 I think it should be deleted 🔜 it doesn’t bring any good 👍🏻 and for that I rate it one ⭐️ i wish I could rate none 😀
attributes.title: This app is the worse

attributes.review: I’m a 50 years old. A loyal trump supporter !!! Tramp 2020. And this application was very hard to figure out. I thought it be better than using the web. It’s so hard to navigate and find information. Not recommended.
attributes.title: not helpful

attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see Barron Trump. NOT A CHEETO MAN WITH A WIG!! i’m very disappointed in the creators of this app for not providing the info i want. i also wanted to see the list of words Donald Trump has made up, that list wasn’t on here either!! overall, 1/10 experience
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to fill an empty spot on my homepage but this app did so much more than take up space 😤 This app promotes a racist rhetoric and quite frankly seems like it was developed by underpaid bunker baby minions. Don’t get this app it’s so not worth it 🙄
attributes.title: Useless!

attributes.review: I hope this gets taken down because trump is taking down TikTok and one I opened the app this old wrinkling orange bastard was there I got so scared and even my pet sock got scared I’m sorry this app is just a no no I hope trump isn’t president next time 🥰
attributes.title: Trumpinjail2020😌

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to make fun of this Cheeto but it ruined my phone and I couldn’t use it for a week then when I tried deleting it his ding dong Cheeto was my background get some help😘🧚🏼‍♂️also if you delete tiktok we will ruin you luv😉🧚🏼‍♂️🥳😌
attributes.title: Just no👁👄👁

attributes.review: worst app I’ve ever downloaded. Pretty sure it gave my phone a virus and deported my parents and took away my right to health care and caused mass death across the country due to arrogance and irresponsible actions. wouldn’t recommend
attributes.title: don’t get unless you’re a racist

attributes.review: this app was awful and created in the worst way possible. I do not recommend due to the fact that when I open the app there is a Cheeto staring at me, that will give me nightmares and I will not accept that. Absolutely awful 😤.
attributes.title: gross

attributes.review: When I opened it ask for my phone number I don’t want to give my phone number but the thing is saying to give me to give them my phone number when I do not want to like geez
attributes.title: This app is the worst
